description: This file is the main entry point for a database viewer application, providing a user interface to browse tables and data from connected databases. It includes HTML structure, CSS styling, and JavaScript functions for dynamic data loading and user interaction.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Loads and displays the available databases by fetching from the API.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases and resets the UI state.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Toggles the display of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads and displays the tables for the selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders the data as an HTML table in the specified container.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders a single cell of the table, handling null values and objects.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses a cell's content to show more data.
